cookie.title: Cookie 政策
cookie.description: 我们使用必要的 Cookie 来确保网站正常运行。我们也使用分析 Cookie 来了解访客如何与网站互动，这有助于我们改进服务。您可以通过下面的选项来控制 Cookie 设置。

cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.description: We use necessary cookies to ensure the website functions properly. We also use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with the website, which helps us improve our services. You can control cookie settings through the options below.
